text: "Lampara Pa`Mis Pies" is a song by Juan Luis Guerra, released on August 30, 2019 as the fourth single from his fourteenth studio album Literal. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" !Chart (2019) !Peak position |- ! scope="row" |Dominican Republic (Monitor Latino)http://charts.monitorlatino.com/top20/Print/RD/general/20191230 | style="text-align:center" |10 |- ! scope="row" |Puerto Rico (Monitor Latino)http://charts.monitorlatino.com/top20/Print/puerto%20Rico/general/20191209 | style="text-align:center" |12 |- |- |} == References == Category:2019 singles Category:Juan Luis Guerra songs Category:2019 songs Category:Songs written by Juan Luis Guerra
title: Lámpara Pa' Mis Pies
